The Santa Cruz Trek is a popular three-to-four-day hike in the
mountain range. The best time to do the trek is during the dry season, from May to September.

The hike may be done in two directions: from Vaqueria to Cashapampa, or from Cashapampa to Vaqueria. However, from the logistical perspective, it may be better to go from Vaqueria to Cashapampa, because from Cashapampa it is easier to go by public transportation back to Huaraz.

There is a fee of 65 soles to enter the Huascaran National Park. This allows you to stay in the park for up to 30 days.
